description:
Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by a CMIP6 model with 1% per year atmospheric carbon dioxide increased to quadrupling then held fixed for 200 years.
Run for a minimum of 350 years (500 years encouraged).
keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, 1% per yr CO2, quadrupled CO2, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
long_name: Ice sheet model driven with 1% per yr CO2 increase to quadrupling forcing
